summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah Review Date: 2022/05/09 Store: Kristin Ess Product Description: ['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'} Review Text: this rust/burnt orange colored scrunchie is exactly what I wanted. It holds bun in place overnight
I have both thin and fine hair and wrap it 3 times around a messy top knot bun
I feel it would look great and effortless wrapped once or twice for someone with thicker or fuller hair
it is accurately described oversized Review Title: love it! super soft large scrunchie great hold Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Marine Forest Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit, 2 Colors in 1 Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils Shaping Kit Reusable, 1 Brush and 1 Razor Review Date: 2022/05/10 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: I am pleasantly surprised the simplicity this product provides for brown definition. I have never used a similar product. Simple-just choose the right stencil for your born shape and tap the foam applicator on brows. Also comes with small brush used for finishing touches and small razor. I have not used the razor.
The natural brown shade was right for me with medium brown hair and brows.
Did not easily smear Review Title: easy to use brow kit. did not easily smear Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp and Eyebrow Stencil Kit, One Step Eyebrow Stamp and Shaping Kit for Perfect Brow, Eyebrow Brush,Eyebrow soap kit ,Gel Brow Soap Wax, Eyeshadow Stick Shimmer Eyeshadow Pencil ,Eye Makeup Review Date: 2022/05/24 Store: Arindar Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Arindar', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmer,Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Specialty': 'Sweatproof', 'Package Dimensions': '6.89 x 6.77 x 1.5 inches; 4.97 Ounces'} Review Text: This brow color was a bit too dark for me and I have yet to find a stencil that I can get used to.
This item came with lots of stencil options and I brow bar too
I really like both eyeshadow sticks and soft blenders Review Title: lots of items for the price Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Hair Brush Spray Set With Detangling Wide Tooth Comb And Detanger Brush For Curly Hair With Hair Mist Spray Bottle 10oz Curl Hair Tools For Women Men Black Natural Hair 3a To 4c Hair Types Review Date: 2022/06/06 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} Review Text: I would buy this set just for the spray bottle.
I has an extended spray with a very fine mist! I would love to use this in the summer heat to spray cool water on face/body
the brush and comb are wide toothed and sturdy Review Title: Love this spray bottle MISTING style Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles for Toiletries - Autdor 3OZ Travel Size Toiletries Set TSA Approved Travel Containers BPA Free LeakProof Refillable Liquid Travel Accessories for Shampoo Conditioner and Lotion Review Date: 2022/06/15 Store: Autdor Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.24 x 1.65 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'UPC': '774848982001', 'Manufacturer': 'Autdor'} Review Text: I can’t say enough good things about these. They feel great and were perfect for our camper. My wife loves that they come with labels. Seriously a great set. Review Title: So great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Big Hair Claw Clips for Women and Girls - 4.3 Inch 8 Pcs Matte Claw Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Large Jaw Clips for Thin Hair, 2 Styles Strong Hold Hair Accessories for Girls Review Date: 2022/06/15 Store: HH Fashion Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HH Fashion', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal'} Review Text: Strong hold. Open wide and finishing is good on these. Review Title: Good quality and value. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Glitter Eyeliner Liquid, Liquid Eyeliner Colorful Set, 10 Colors Liquid Glitter Eyeliner, Glitter Liquid Eyeshadow Set, Shimmer Sparkling Neon Eye liners for Women, Glitter Eyeliner Pencil Review Date: 2022/06/23 Store: Reddhoon Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 3.86 x 0.67 inches; 4.66 Ounces'} Review Text: Great selection of colors. Shadow is color tinted each with fine matching glitter mixed well throughout Review Title: great colors with same color glitter mixed in Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) Review Date: 2022/07/21 Store: YouClean Product Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'} Review Text: These tiny soaps are perfect for travel and I love them for camping.
Easy dissolve. Great packaging Review Title: perfect travel size Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Combofix 2Pcs Silk Scrunchies Mulberry Silk Hair Ties Cute Large Scrunchie Elastic Bands Thick Curly Hair Black Brown Ponytail Fixing Hair Tie Suitable for Girls of all ages Review Date: 2022/07/21 Store: combofix Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Combofix', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 5.94 x 0.55 inches; 0.67 Ounces', 'UPC': '774848980564'} Review Text: feel like satin not silk
nice pure black and chocolate brown in color
can barely get around my thin ponytail twice. would not recommend for thick hair or full ponytail Review Title: small scrunchies Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Chrome Nail Powder Palette , Metallic Mirror Effect Chrome Powder for Nails , Rose Gold Sliver Pink Holographic Nail Glitter Nail Pigment Powder for DIY Salon Nail Art Decorations Review Date: 2022/07/21 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.05 x 0.55 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: I like this as a touch of glitter option compared to glitter polishes that are using more chunky pieces of glitter. Tiny bit of product gives a great shimmer to manicure.
does not come with UV light, base or top coat Review Title: super fine glittery effect Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FantaLook Short Heart Styled Reddish Brown Heat Resistant Wig with Teeth Necklace Earrings for Halloween Party Review Date: 2022/07/23 Store: FantaLook Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Color': 'Reddish Brown', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': '耐热', 'Package Dimensions': '8.94 x 7.09 x 2.83 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'Manufacturer': 'MD'} Review Text: Good quality wig with lots of accessories. The instructions were good snd it came ready to use. Review Title: Fun set Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 68PCS Sonic Temporary Tattoos Sticker, The Cartoon Hedgehong Tattoos for Party Favor Gift Boy Children Birthday Kids Party Decoration Review Date: 2022/08/11 Store: BEDOVEOO Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'BEDOVEOO', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Pattern': 'Cartoon', 'Number of Pieces': '68', 'Package Dimensions': '7.56 x 5.04 x 0.28 inches; 0.95 Ounces', 'UPC': '758226198161 758226197942'} Review Text: This set of tattoos comes with a wide variety of characters. Some are more cartoon like and some seem to have more of a digital image. While they all apply as a general temporary tattoo does. Review Title: perfect for my son the sonic fan Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ANGNYA Acrylic Nail Brush，Kolinsky Nail Art Brushes for Acrylic Application，Size 8 Oval Crimped Sable Acrylic Brush for Professional Manicure DIY Home Salon(Pink) Review Date: 2022/08/18 Store: ANGNYA Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': '4-Pink', 'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 1.14 x 0.55 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'ANGNYA', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: unfortunately very poor constructed
$16.99 and then the entire barrel snapped off the handle before the bristles even fanned out Review Title: entire barrel snapped of handle at first touch Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Probeauty Auburn Bouffant Beehive Wig, Long Brown Curly Wave 60s 80s Vintage Party Wig for Halloween costume Review Date: 2022/09/18 Store: Probeauty Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Probeauty', 'Package Dimensions': '10.16 x 9.65 x 3.78 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'Department': 'womens'} Review Text: 4 stars as I would consider brown wig as quite red/brown
Style is as shown. Good quality. Needs a little combing but well packaged
Comes with separate cap Review Title: nice wig. good style Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 1PCS Sparkling Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clips, Braided Hair Clips for Women, Rhinestone Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Flower Hair Clip with 3 Small Clips, Hair Barrettes for Women Girls Styling Review Date: 2022/12/20 Store: Lmnonnok Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lmnonnok', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Rhinestone', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Crystal', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.2 x 1.1 inches; 1.59 Ounces'} Review Text: Love these. Good size and really cute. Review Title: Really cute Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Shopping Preferences and Behavior Summary:**

- **Hair Accessories**: Frequent purchases of scrunchies and hair clips, indicating a strong preference for stylish and functional hair accessories which accommodate various hair types and styles.
  
- **Eyebrow Care**: Engages actively with eyebrow shaping and coloring products; values ease of use and natural aesthetics.

- **Makeup**: Interest in a variety of eye makeup products, favoring glitter and shimmer options that allow for versatility in looks.

- **Travel Essentials**: Appears to prioritize convenient and portable solutions for travel, as seen in multiple purchases of travel-sized toiletries and handy accessories.

- **Quality and Function**: Reviews highlight a preference for products that combine aesthetics with functionality, noting soft textures, strong hold, and ease of use.

- **Natural Materials**: Shows inclination towards products with natural ingredients and eco-friendly packaging.

- **Value for Money**: Often comments on product value, suggesting a discerning shopper who looks for quality within a budget.

- **Variety and Options**: Enjoys a diverse range of products, particularly in the beauty category, which reflects a willingness to experiment and find ideal solutions.

Overall, this individual exhibits a modern and practical approach to beauty and personal care, with a clear preference for trendy yet functional solutions that accommodate their lifestyle.
